person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The Beirut military court also sentenced to life in jail in absentia Etian Saqr , former head of the pro-Israeli Guardians of the Cedars , a small rightwing Christian civil war militia .

| Person |
|--------|

| former head of the pro-Israeli Guardians of the Cedars |

Explanation:
The paragraph mentions two persons: Etian Saqr and the person described as "former head of the pro-Israeli Guardians of the Cedars". To ensure precision, we present both entities as they appear in the paragraph.

| Person |
|--------|

| former head of the pro-Israeli Guardians of the Cedars |

The paragraph only mentions two entities that clearly refer to persons: Etian Saqr and the person who was the former head of the Guardians of the Cedars. All other entities in the paragraph, such as "Beirut military court" and "small rightwing Christian civil war militia," do not refer to persons and should not be included in the table.
